Package edu.ithaca.bhamula1.hotel

Interface EmployeeUI_Interface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmployeeUI

    public interface EmployeeUI_Interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void checkEmployeeLogIn​(java.lang.String el, java.lang.String epwd)
      Validates inputted employee login and password compared to employee list; if login is accurate, save employee state
      boolean checkEmpReq​()
      Searches for employee's assigned requests to be fulfilled, if their ID is associated with a request
      void closeUI​()
      Logs out employee; closes/ends employeeUI and returns to the main screen menu, saving state of employee
      void completeRequest​(int req)
      Fulfills a request associated with the employee and removes it from list of active requests
      void employeeLogScreenUI​()
      Before employee can choose options, valid input must be entered -- this method checks for valid input and calls checkEmployeeLogIn to verify login data
      java.lang.String getEmplTitle​()  
      void setEmployee​(EmployeeIMPL e)  
      void takeRequests​(int req)
      Takes an active request and assigns it to an employee and the employee to the request, and sets employee as unavailable
      void uiInteraction​(HotelInterface h)
      All UI interaction below - Employee can make choice if logged in
      void viewOpenRequests​()
      Displays active requests made for specific room numbers using the static list of activeRequests in Hotel; displays message if there are no active requests

        java.lang.String getEmplTitle​()

      • setEmployee

        void setEmployee​(EmployeeIMPL e)

      • uiInteraction

        void uiInteraction​(HotelInterface h)
        All UI interaction below - Employee can make choice if logged in
        Parameters:
        h - Used to access employee list and requests from Hotel object

      • checkEmployeeLogIn

        void checkEmployeeLogIn​(java.lang.String el,
                        java.lang.String epwd)
        Validates inputted employee login and password compared to employee list; if login is accurate, save employee state
        Parameters:
        el - Employee login input
        epwd - Employee password input

      • employeeLogScreenUI

        void employeeLogScreenUI​()
        Before employee can choose options, valid input must be entered -- this method checks for valid input and calls checkEmployeeLogIn to verify login data

      • viewOpenRequests

        void viewOpenRequests​()
        Displays active requests made for specific room numbers using the static list of activeRequests in Hotel; displays message if there are no active requests

      • takeRequests

        void takeRequests​(int req)
        Takes an active request and assigns it to an employee and the employee to the request, and sets employee as unavailable
        Parameters:
        req - Request number

      • checkEmpReq

        boolean checkEmpReq​()
        Searches for employee's assigned requests to be fulfilled, if their ID is associated with a request
        Returns:
        True if employee has request to fulfill, false otherwise

      • completeRequest

        void completeRequest​(int req)
        Fulfills a request associated with the employee and removes it from list of active requests
        Parameters:
        req - Request to be fulfilled

      • closeUI

        void closeUI​()
        Logs out employee; closes/ends employeeUI and returns to the main screen menu, saving state of employee
